title: This is not the video of Indian Air Force attacking Pakistan
subtitle: The video posted is a game video. So, the claim of it being Indian Air Force attack video is FALSE
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared as the Indian Air Force attack on Pakistan by many pages on Facebook. Let’s try to analyze whether there is any truth in the video posted on Facebook.

Claim: The video shows the Indian Air Force attack carried out on POK. Fact: The video posted is a game video. So, the claim of it being Indian Air Force attack video is FALSE

When the video posted on Facebook is divided into frames using Invid software and a Google Reverse Image Search on the frames is done, a similar YouTube video posted four years back can be found. The video found is a game video from which the initial titles are removed and posted on Facebook as Indian Air Force attack video. Also, a YouTube search with keywords ‘Taliban US Apache Simulator’ can lead to the original video posted on YouTube.

Finally, the video posted on Facebook as Indian Air Force attack video is actually a game video.
